#
# Makefile generated by RobotLib to compile a RobotLib project.
#

CXX = g++

setup:
	mkdir bin

clean:
	rm -r bin
	make setup

cleanall:
	rm -r bin
	mkdir bin
	rm -r robotController/bin
	rm -r robotController/lib
	mkdir robotController/bin
	mkdir robotController/lib
	mkdir robotController/bin/comm
	mkdir robotController/bin/util
